Pre-Game Insights: Several of Germany’s senior stars stepped down from the national team after Euro 2024, so expect many new faces for Die Mannschaft.
Julian Nagelsmann has appointed Bayern Munich’s Joshua Kimmich as Germany captain and he is expected to start at right-back for the team.

Stuttgart’s Angelo Stiller will be hoping to make his international debut; with players like Aleksandar Pavlovic, Robert Andrich, and Pascal Gross all gunning to fill in the midfield roles previously occupied by retired veterans Toni Kroos and Ilkay Gundogan.
Antonio Rudiger has been rested, whereas Leroy Sane is expected to miss this game due to fitness issues.
Florian Wirtz, Kai Havertz, Jamal Musiala, and Niclas Fullkrug will complete the attack.
